sentences.en: It's very difficult to demote somebody who has been filling in during maternity leave.
sentences.cn: 给替代歇产假的人降职是很难的。

sentences.en: I should demote you from senior minister to elder.
sentences.cn: 我要把你从高级牧师降级为长老。

sentences.en: It is illegal to demote an employee without reason.
sentences.cn: 无缘无故将一名员工降级是违法的。
